item.title: Example post
item.description: What you need to do is: Create the sockets. Add the sockets to the set (FD_SET). Find the socket with the highest file descriptor for calls to select(). Above also works with different type sockets (e.g. AF_INET, AF_INET6). It even works if you have different type sockets (e.g. one IPv4 and one IPv6) listening on the same port number. Dual stack sockets are a thing but this approach is more flexible.
